thread.title: Dansby
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Dansby

author: Dansby
title: Dansby
text:
The assistant Manager Tim at Town Fire Tire in Orange, CT did an excellent job today. He displayed quality costumer service during my visit to the store. He was knowledgeable about the product and ensured that he found the best tire to suit my driving needs. The store was clean and the tire display by the waiting area was nicely done. Tim was very courteous throughout the entire transaction. He should promoted to a higher level in the company because of his outstanding sale service. I will recommend all my family and friends go see Tim for all their service needs.
My car was ready in a timely manner and my car rides brand new again.
Thank you
